EmailTemplate.name: Trainee accept - trainee - 1st supervisor
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You accepted an invitation to gain experience hours. Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is active!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You accepted an invitation to gain experience hours under {!Associations__c.Parent_Licensee_Name__c} on {!Associations__c.Current_Datetime__c}.
Your {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} license is now active and you can start working!
Get and print your license through our new online system:
Go to {!Associations__c.License_Portal_URL__c}. Sign in or create an account and follow instructions.
Please call or email us if you need us to send you a printed copy.
Questions? Need help? {!Associations__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Associations__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov MAI026
